import { MoreVertical, Video, X, Search, MapPin, Link2, MoreHorizontal, Bell, Smile, ChevronDown, Globe, Lock, Plus, User, Users, Image, Camera, Tag, Edit2, MessageCircle, Trash2, Briefcase, Clock } from 'react-feather'; export const NewJob = () => (

Remind me

Remind me of this later today.

Message

Send an automatic congratz message.

Remove

Removes this widget from your feed.

Nelly has a new job!

Send her message congratulating her for getting this job.

)
